abstract: A 15-room, 6-bedroom apartment is actually two separate spaces, one of which needs work.
snippet: A 15-room, 6-bedroom apartment is actually two separate spaces, one of which needs work.
lead_paragraph: The most expensive apartment sale of the week in Manhattan, according to property records, was a 15-room, 6-bedroom co-op at 625 Park Avenue that had an asking price of $29.75 million - although the final sale price could not be confirmed before publication.

headline.main: Big Ticket | Park Ave. Co-op Is Sale of Week
